text: Rashtrapati Bhavan (, Sanskrit : राष्ट्रपतिभवनम्) is the official home of the President of India, located in New Delhi, India. ==References== ===Bibliography=== * * * Inan, Aseem, " Tensions Manifested: Reading the Viceroy's House in New Delhi ", in The Emerging Asian City: Concomitant Urbanities and Urbanisms, ed. Vinayak Bharne, Routledge UK, 2012 * * Category:Buildings and structures in New Delhi
title: Rashtrapati Bhavan
